_header: There were three wily three wily there were
Note:
For a variant cf. 5111. Cf. D’Urfey (1698)
XD’Urfey, Thomas. Wit and Mirth: or, Pills to Purge Melancholy. 1st ed., 4 vols, 1698-1706; 2nd ed., 6 vols, 1719-20, 2.127.
_description: Abuse of Women — four couplets and burden: ‘Herfor & therfor & therfor I came / And for to praysse this prety woman’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Ther wer iii wylly 3 wyly ther werA fox a fryyr and a
                    woman…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…þer wer 3 wold be betyn 3 wold be betyn ther werA myll a
                    stoke fysche & a woman
